name: Cherry On Top
description:
Guide Cherro in food world. Explore the world to find powerups and tools, make him strong and reach the Top of Cake to become Cherry On Top

Music tracks and composers:
- Cool Action Intro by Eric Matyas
- Across the Desolate Southwest by Eric Matyas
- Ruins by Beau Buckley
- Upon the Glance of the old One by Zsh
- CHRONOS by Julian V Kogasu
- Sweet Sweet Diabetes by Captain Normalguy
